name: mergesort
snippet: const _mergeArrays = (a, b) => { const c = []; while (a.length && b.length) {c.push(a[0] > b[0] ? b.shift() : a.shift())} while (a.length) {c.push(a.shift())} while (b.length) {c.push(b.shift())} return c; } const mergeSort = (a) => { if (a.length < 2) return a; const middle = Math.floor(a.length / 2); const a_l = a.slice(0, middle); const a_r = a.slice(middle, a.length); const sorted_l = mergeSort(a_l); const sorted_r = mergeSort(a_r); return _mergeArrays(sorted_l, sorted_r);}
